thread.title: Jimmy Fallon Passes Us The Pros And Cons Of Denver's New 'Marijuana Camp'
thread.title_full: Jimmy Fallon Passes Us The Pros And Cons Of Denver's New 'Marijuana Camp'

author: Andy McDonald
title: Jimmy Fallon Passes Us The Pros And Cons Of Denver's New 'Marijuana Camp'
text:
reddit 
Pro ... wait, what were we talking about? 
On Monday's "Jimmy Fallon," Jimmy took his audience through the positive and negative aspects of a new Denver resort called "CannaCamp," a cannabis-themed getaway where you can participate in various outdoor activities while smoking marijuana all day. Pro: It's like summer camp, but with marijuana. Con: So, basically ... summer camp. 
In related news, the Denver International Airport has officially become the busiest airport in the world. Also on HuffPost:
